description: Start a program in a VM without the need for network connection

username.description: The username of the vSphere vCenter.

vm_password.description: The password used to login to the VM.

vm_shell.description: The absolute path to the program to start. On Linux this is executed via bash.

vm_shell_cwd.description: The current working directory of the application from which it will be run

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the vSphere vCenter.

vm_username.description: The user to connect to the VM.

vm_shell_env.description: Comma separated list of envirnoment variable, specified in the guest OS notation

vm_id_type.description: The identification tag for the VM

validate_certs.description: Allows connection when SSL certificates are not valid. Set to false when certificates are not trusted.

password.description: The password of the vSphere vCenter.
